name: Tracify
author: Tracify

sections.description:
AI-Tracking to scale your business to the next level.

Our patent-pending AI technology lets you track every customer interaction on your website without invading their privacy. Cross-device, cross-domain, cross-session – no cookies required. iOS14 does not affect our tracking at all. Made and hosted 100% in Germany.

Tracify integrates with various marketing platforms to bring all your data together in one place and give you complete transparency:

  • Facebook
  • Google Ads
  • Klaviyo
  • TikTok

Get a Demo at Tracify.ai
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and either upload the .zip file via your WordPress Admin Panel (Plugins > Add New) or unzip the file and upload the folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.

  2. Activate the plugin.

  3. In your WordPress Admin Panel go to Settings > Tracify and enter your own CSID.

  4. Click “Save Settings”.

  5. Installation and activation finished.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial release.

1.0.1

Updated the plugin’s long description

1.0.2

Updated the plugin’s repository structure

1.0.3

Fixed an issue where the tracking script would not load on all pages.

2.0.0

Breaking version, where the Tracify Token field is added. This version
will provide improved order tracking.

3.0.0

More control over when orders are sent to Tracify, improved tracking options.

3.0.1

Bugfix release.

3.0.2

Increased latest tested version.
